title: Share of U.S. teenagers who use Snapchat 2018 , by age
summary: According to a third quarter 2018 survey , 74 % of 13-14 internet users in the U.S. Snapchat used Share .
The video platform had a U.S. Share of 63 % among 15-17 use internet users .
Overall , 38 % of use Share users accessed the platform several times a day .
